m_szDocTitle: Patent US20110136044 - Gas diffusion layer for fuel cell applications - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Gas diffusion layer for fuel cell applications US 20110136044 A1 Abstract A gas diffusion layer (GDL) for fuel cell applications that can prevented channels of a bipolar plate from being intruded. The gas diffusion layer is manufactured by cutting a GDL material at a certain angle such that a machine direction of the inherent high stiffness of the GDL material is not in parallel with a major flow field direction of a bipolar plate to prevent the GDL intrusion into the channels of the bipolar plate without modifying an existing method for manufacturing the gas diffusion layer.
